name: code-highlighter
clean:artifacts: rimraf dist dist-cjs bin node_modules/.vitest tsconfig.tsbuildinfo
description: Lightweight TypeScript syntax highlighting library + CLI (initial JS support) with HTML and ANSI output and theming.

scripts.build:executables: npm run build && npm run build:cjs && npm run package:executables
scripts.build:cjs: tsc -p tsconfig.cjs.json && cp -r src/handlers dist-cjs/src/ && cp -r src/themes dist-cjs/src/ && cp -r src/grammars dist-cjs/src/ && cp -r src/generated dist-cjs/src/ && cp src/cli-cjs.js dist-cjs/src/cli-cjs.cjs
scripts.package:executables: pkg dist-cjs/src/cli-cjs.cjs --targets node18-linux-x64,node18-win-x64 --out-path bin && mv bin/cli-cjs-linux bin/code-highlight-linux && mv bin/cli-cjs-win.exe bin/code-highlight-win.exe
scripts.test:full: npm run clean:artifacts && npm run build && vitest run --clearCache
scripts.test:fresh: npm run clean:cache && npm run build && vitest run --clearCache
